docs.text: 事件 返回目录 时间事件 Patterns: at % time % [in % worlds %] Since: 1.3.4 在特定时间( 游戏时间 )调用 at 18:00 at 7am in "world" On AoE Cloud Effect Patterns: [on] (area|AoE) [cloud] effect Since: 2.2-dev21 Called when area effect cloud applies its potion effect. This happens every 5 ticks by default. on area cloud effect : 动作事件 Patterns: [on] [player] arm swing Since: 2.5.1 当玩家角色做出有关于手臂的相关动作时触发 on arm swing : send "You swung your arm!" On Armor Change Patterns: [on] [player] armor change[d] Since: 2.5 当玩家更换盔甲时调用 on armor change : broadcast "You equipped %event-item%!" Missing 经测试无效果 On Bed Enter Patterns: [on] bed enter[ing] [on] [player] enter[ing] [a] bed Since: 1.0 当玩家使用床睡觉的时候触发 on bed enter : send "该触发条件：当玩家在夜晚时使用床睡觉时触发。白天使用床，并不会触发脚本。" On Bed Leave Patterns: [on] bed leav (e|ing) [on] [player] leav (e|ing) [a] bed Since: 1.0 起床的时候调用 on bed leave : send "当玩家起床时调用" On Block Damage Patterns: [on] block damag(ing|e) Since: 1.0 当玩家破坏方块时调用。通常可以使用 leftclick 事件 on block damaging : # 判定破坏方块的类型是否为 log (原木) - 当然可以是其他方块 if block is log : send "你正在破坏原木方块" On Block Fertilize Patterns: [on] [block] fertilize Since: 2.5 施肥时调 on block fertilize : send "&b施肥时调用 : &r施肥范围 (&e%size of fertilized blocks%&r格方块受到影响)." On Block Growth Patterns: [on] (plant|crop|block) grow [(th|ing)] [[of] % item types % ] Since: 2.2-修复-V10 当作物生长时调用. on crop growing : broadcast "plant=植物|crop=作物|block=方块|grow拥有两种模式 -> growth 或 gorwing" On Book Edit Patterns: [on] book (edit|change|write) Since: 2.2-dev31 当编辑一本书的时候调用 on book edit : broadcast "编辑书并点击完成时调用，如果未改动书中内容并点击完成是不调用的" On Book Sign Patterns: [on] book sign[ing] Since: 2.2-dev31 当玩家署名一本书调用 on book sign : broadcast "已署名一本书调用(On Book Sign)" On Break/Mine Patterns: [on] [block] (break[ing]|min(e|ing)) [[of] % item types / block datas % ] Since: 1.0 (break), unknown (mine), 2.6 (BlockData support) 当方块被玩家摧毁时调用。如果使用 'Mine' , 只有破坏方块掉落事件才会调用。 #---------------------------------------------# # 第一种形式：未指定方块类型 # 特性一：当挖掘等级不符合则不调用，挖掘等级高于自身的方块时也不掉落 # 特性二：破坏完成之后调用。有一个先后顺序 on mine : broadcast "[on mine] 被调用" #---------------------------------------------# # 第二种形式：指定方块类型 on mine of any ore : broadcast "[on mine of any ore] 被调用" #---------------------------------------------# # 破坏 指定物品时才掉落 这里案例用的是 stone on break of stone : broadcast "我破坏了 %item%" #---------------------------------------------# # 该定义了破坏箱子时,需要指定朝向 on break of chest[facing=north] : broadcast "箱子被破坏" #---------------------------------------------# # 该定义了破坏作物方块时，可指定作物的成熟度 on break of potatoes[age=7] : broadcast "作物被破坏" On Bucket Empty Patterns: [on] bucket empty[ing] [on] [player] empty[ing] [a] bucket Since: 1.0 当清空水桶时调用. 可以使用 放置事件 来判定是水或者岩浆. on bucket empty : broadcast "&a案例：&7[&bOn Bucket Empty&7] &a成功调用！" On Bucket fill Patterns: [on] bucket fill[ing] [on] [player] fill[ing] [a] bucket Since: 1.0 当玩家的桶中有液体时调用 on player filling a bucket : broadcast "&a案例：&7[&bOn Bucket fill&7] &a成功调用！" On Burn Patterns: [on] [block] burn[ing] [[of] % item types / block datas %] Since: 1.0, 2.6 (BlockData support) 当方块被烧毁时调用 # 方块被点燃时并不会调用，而是方块被烧毁之后才调用！ # 注意顺序问题 on burn : broadcast "&a案例：&7[&bOn Burn&7] &a成功调用！" # 可以指定多个物品类型 wood = 木头 ， fences = 栅栏 ， chests = 箱子 # 测试无效 on burn of wood, fences, or chests : broadcast "&a案例：&7[&bOn Burn&7] &a成功调用！" on burn of oak_log[axis=y] : On Can Build Check Patterns: [on] [block] can build check Since: 1.0 (basic), 2.0 ([un]cancellable) 当玩家持有方块或可放置物品时右键点击放置方块时调用. 可通过取消事件(cancel)来阻止放置方块,也可以取消. 注意: 要放置方块的 data 是无法使用的.只有 ID 是有效可用的. on block can build check : cancel event On Chat Patterns: [on] chat Since: 1.4.1 每当玩家发送消息时调用. 使用 聊天格式化 修改消息格式t, 使用 聊天对象 编辑收/发消息的聊天对象. on chat : if player has permission "owner" : set chat format to "<red>[player]<light gray> : <light red>[message]" else if player has permission "admin" : set chat format to "<light red>[player]<light gray> : <orange>[message]" else : #default message format set chat format to "<orange>[player]<light gray> : <white>[message]" On Chunk Generate Patterns: [on] chunk (generat|populat)(e|ing) Since: 1.0 当生成新区块时调用. on chunk generate : On Chunk Load Patterns: [on] chunk load[ing] Since: 1.0 当区块加载时调用。 on chunk load : On Chunk Unload Patterns: [on] chunk unload[ing] Since: 1.0 当取消区块加载时调用。 on chunk unload : On Click Patterns: [on] [(right|left)] [( |-)]] [mouse[( |-)]]click[ing] [on % entity type / item type %] [(with|using|holding) % item type %] [on] [(right|left) [( |-)]] [mouse[( |-)]]click[ing] (with|using|holding) % item type % on % entity type / item type % Since: 1.0 当玩家点击：方块、实体、空气时调用，无论玩家是否有手持物品。 注意：空手右键空气事件无法调用。 on click : on rightclick holding a fishing rod : on leftclick on a stone or obsidian : on rightclick on a creeper : on click with a sword : On Combust Patterns: [on] combust[ing] Since: 1.0 当实体着火时调用。 例如：岩浆、火、火球、阳光(特指僵尸、骷髅) on combust : On Command Patterns: [on] command [% text %] Since: 2.0 当玩家输入命令时调用。 命令可以是任意命令不一定要是Skript的命令。 查看关于Skript命令 . on command : on command "/stop" : on command "pm Njol " : On Connect Patterns: [on] [player] connect[ing] Since: 2.0 当玩家连接服务器时调用。 与 on join 不同，该事件是指玩家在连接过程中时调用。 on join 是玩家加入了服务器后才会被调用的。 on connect : player doesn't have permission "VIP" number of players is greater than 15 kick the player due to "The last 5 slots are reserved for VIP players." On Consume Patterns: [on] [player] ((eat|drink)[ing]|consum(e|ing)) [[of] % item types % ] Since: 2.0 当玩家吃/喝/完时调用。 例如：牛奶、苹果、面包、药水、肉... on consume : On Craft Patterns: [on] [player] craft[ing] [[of] % item types %] Since: unknown (before 2.1) 当玩家合成(制作)物品时调用 on craft : On Creeper Power Patterns: [on] creeper power Since: 1.0 当苦力怕被闪电击中后变成闪电苦力怕时调用。 当然可以被取消该事件 on creeper power : On Damage Patterns: [on] damag (e|ing) [of % entity type %] Since: 1.0 当一个实体受到另一个实体的伤害时调用。 包含：岩浆、火焰、窒息、衰落、等 on damage : on damage of a player : On Death Patterns: [on] death [of % entity types %] Since: 1.0 当生物（包含玩家）死亡时调用 on death : on death of player : on death of a wither or ender dragon : broadcast "A %entity% has been slain in %world%!" On Dispense Patterns: [on] dispens (e|ing) [[of] % item types % ] Since: unknown (before 2.1) 当发射器发射容器内物品时调用 on dispense of iron block : broadcast "&7[&bOn Dispense&7] &a被调用" On Drop Patterns: [on] [player] drop[ing] [[of] % item types %] Since: unknown (before 2.1) 当玩家从他们的物品背包栏中丢弃物品时调用 on drop : broadcast "&7[&bOn Drop&7] &a被调用" On Enchant Patterns: [on] [item] enchant Since: 2.5 当玩家成功附魔物品时调用. 查看附魔内容 on enchant : if the clicked button is enchantment option 1 : set the applied enchantments to sharpness 10 and unbreaking 10 On Enchant Prepare Patterns: [on] [item] enchant prepare Since: 2.5 当玩家将物品放入附魔台时调用。 附魔内容参考 on enchant prepare : set enchant offer 1 to sharpness 1 set the cost of enchant offer 1 to 10 levels On Enderman/Sheep/Silverfish/Falling Block Patterns: [on] enderman place [on] enderman pickup [on] sheep eat[on] silverfish enter [ on ] silverfish exit [on] falling block land[ing] Since: unknown , 2.5.2 (falling block) 当方块状态被改变时调用。 末影人搬运方块或放置方块时、羊吃草地时、蠹虫钻入或钻出方块时、方块坠落落地形成方块状态时（沙子、沙砾） on sheep eat : kill entity broadcast "A sheep stole some grass!" on falling block land : if event-entity is a falling dirt : cancel event On Entity Dismount Patterns: [on] dismount[ing] Since: 2.2-dev13b 当实体从马上下来时调用 on dismount : kill event-entity On Entity Mount Patterns: [on] mount[ing] Since: 2.2-dev13b 当实体乘骑时调用 on mount : cancel event On Entity Portal Patterns: [on] entity portal Since: 2.5.3 当实体通过传送门时调用. 可以 取消事件 阻止实体传送。 on entity portal : broadcast "A %type of event-entity% has entered a portal! On Experience Spawn Patterns: [on] [e]xp[erience] [orb] spawn[on] spawn of [a[n]] [e]xp[erience] [orb] Since: 2.0 当经验即将生成时调用.可以通过该事件取消经验生成. Please note that it's impossible to detect xp orbs spawned by plugins (including Skript) with Bukkit, thus make sure that you have no such plugins if you don't want any xp orbs to spawn. (Many plugins that only change the experience dropped by blocks or entities will be detected without problems though) on xp spawn : world is "minigame_world" cancel event On Explode Patterns: [on] explo (d(e|ing)|sion) Since: 1.0 当爆炸事件发生时调用(包含了TNT爆炸或苦力怕的爆炸). on explosion : On Explosion Prime Patterns: [on] explosion prime Since: 1.0 当TNT被点燃或苦力怕距离很近即将爆炸时调用。苦力怕则可以远离它而中止该事件被调用。 on explosion prime : On Fade Patterns: [on] [block] fad (e|ing) [[of] % item types / block datas % ] Since: 1.0, 2.6 (BlockData support) 当方块即将消失时调用（雪或冰） on fade of snow or ice : on fade of snow[layers=2] On Firework Explode Patterns: [on] [a] firework explo (d(e|ing)|sion) [colo[u] red % colors % ] Since: 2.4 当发射烟花并爆炸时调用. on firework explode on firework exploding colored red, light green and black on firework explosion coloured light green : broadcast "A firework colored %colors% was exploded at %location%!" On First Join Patterns: [on] first ( join |login) Since: 1.3.7 当玩家首次登录时调用。 on first join : broadcast "Welcome %player% to the server!" On Fishing Patterns: [on] [player] fish[ing] Since: 1.0 当玩家钓鱼时调用，然而并没有什么大的用处。 on fish : On Flight Toggle Patterns: [on] [player] flight toggl (e|ing)[on] [player] toggl (e|ing) flight Since: 2.2-dev36 当玩家开始或停止飞行时调用。 on flight toggle : if {game::%player%::playing} exists : cancel event On Flow Patterns: [on] [block] flow[ing][on] block mov(e|ing) Since: 1.0 当水或岩浆（龙蛋）流动（传送）到其他方块时调用。 on block flow : if event-block is water : broadcast "Build more dams! It's starting to get wet in here" On Form Patterns: [on] [block] form [ing] [[of] % item types / block datas %] Since: 1.0, 2.6 (BlockData support) 当非玩家创建方块时调用 例如：下雪而被雪覆盖的情况以及水结成冰又或则方块的扩散。该事件并非传播事件(参见 传播事件 ). on form of snow : on form of a mushroom : On Fuel Burn Patterns: [on] fuel burn[ing] Since: 1.0 当熔炉使用 燃料槽 中的物品时调用 on fuel burning : On Gamemode Change Patterns: [on] game[ ]mode change [to % gamemode %] Since: 1.0 当玩家修改其 游戏模式 时调用。 on gamemode change : on gamemode change to adventure : On Gliding State Change Patterns: [on] (gliding state change|toggl(e|ing) gliding) Since: 2.2-dev21 当实体开启或关闭鞘翅滑翔时调用,或服务器强行切换实体的滑翔状态时调用. on toggling gliding : cancel the event # bad idea, but you CAN do it! On Grow Patterns: [on] grow [of (% tree type %|% item type %)] Since: 1.0 (2.2-dev20 for plants) 当 [树|蘑菇|植物] 长到下一个阶段时调用. on grow : on grow of a tree : on grow of a huge jungle tree : On Hand Item Swap Patterns: [on] swap[ping of] [(hand|held)] item[s] Since: 2.3 当玩家使用快捷键切换主副手槽内的物品时调用. 当然主副手的槽可以是空同样能调用. 该事件是在切换之前调用的, 这使你可以取消该事件的发生. on swap hand items : event-player's tool is a diamond sword cancel event On Heal Patterns: [on] heal[ing] Since: 1.0 当实体被治愈时调用。 on heal : On Horse Jump Patterns: [on] horse jump Since: 2.5.1 Called when a horse jumps. on horse jump : push event-entity upwards at speed 2 On Hunger Meter Change Patterns: [on] (food|hunger) (level|met(er|re)|bar) chang (e|ing) Since: 1.4.4 Called when the hunger bar of a player changes, i.e. either increases by eating or decreases over time. on food bar change : On Ignition Patterns: [on] [block] ignit (e|ion) Since: 1.0 Called when a block starts burning, i.e. a fire block is placed next to it and this block is flammable. The burn event will be called when the block is about do be destroyed by the fire. on block ignite : if event-block is a ladder : cancel event On Inventory Click Patterns: [on] [player] inventory (-| ) click [ing] [[at] % item types % ] Since: 2.2-Fixes-V10 Called when clicking on inventory slot. on inventory click : if event-item is stone : give player 1 stone remove 20$ from player's balance On Inventory Close Patterns: [on] inventory clos (ing|e[d]) Since: 2.2-dev21 Called when player's currently viewed inventory is closed. on inventory close : if player's location is {location} : send "You exited the shop!" On Inventory Open Patterns: [on] inventory open[ed] Since: 2.2-dev21 Called when an inventory is opened for player. on inventory open : close player's inventory On Inventory Pickup Patterns: [on] inventory pick[ ]up Since: 2.5.1 Called when an inventory (a hopper, a hopper minecart, etc.) picks up an item on inventory pickup : On Item Break Patterns: [on] [player] tool break[ing][on] [player] break[ing] [(a|the)] tool Since: 2.1.1 Called when a player breaks their tool because its damage reached the maximum value. This event cannot be cancelled. on tool break : On Item Damage Patterns: [on] item damag (e|ing) Since: 2.5 Called when an item is damaged. Most tools are damaged by using them; armor is damaged when the wearer takes damage. on item damage : cancel event On Item Despawn Patterns: [on] (item[ ][stack]|[item] % item types %) despawn [ing][on] [item[ ][stack]] despawn[ing] [[of] % item types %] Since: 2.2-dev35 Called when an item is about to be despawned from the world, usually 5 minutes after it was dropped. on item despawn of diamond : send "Not my precious!" cancel event On Item Mend Patterns: [on] item mend[ing] Since: 2.5.1 Called when a player has an item repaired via the Mending enchantment. on item mend : chance of 50% : cancel the event send "Oops! Mending failed!" to player On Item Merge Patterns: [on] (item[ ][stack]|[item] % item types %) merg (e|ing)[on] item [ ][stack] merg (e|ing) [[of] % item types % ] Since: 2.2-dev35 Called when dropped items merge into a single stack. event-entity will be the entity which is trying to merge, and future event-entity will be the entity which is being merged into. on item merge of gold blocks : cancel event On Item Spawn Patterns: [on] item spawn[ing] [[of] % item types %] Since: unknown (before 2.1) Called whenever an item stack is spawned in a world, e.g. as drop of a block or mob, a player throwing items out of their inventory, or a dispenser dispensing an item (not shooting it). on item spawn of iron sword : broadcast "Someone dropped an iron sword!" On Join Patterns: [on] [player] (login|logging in|join[ing]) Since: 1.0 Called when the player joins the server. The player is already in a world when this event is called, so if you want to prevent players from joining you should prefer on connect over this event. on join : message "Welcome on our awesome server!" broadcast "%player% just joined the server!" On Jump Patterns: [on] [player] jump[ing] Since: 2.3 Called whenever a player jumps. This event requires PaperSpigot. on jump : event-player does not have permission "jump" cancel event On Kick Patterns: [on] [player] (kick|being kicked) Since: 1.0 Called when a player is kicked from the server. You can change the kick message or cancel the event entirely. on kick : On Language Change Patterns: [on] [player] (language|locale) chang (e|ing)[on] [player] chang (e|ing) (language|locale) Since: 2.3 Called after a player changed their language in the game settings. You can use the language expression to get the current language of the player. This event requires Minecraft 1.12+. on language change : if player's language starts with "en" : send "Hello!" On Leaves Decay Patterns: [on] leaves decay[ing] Since: 1.0 Called when a leaf block decays due to not being connected to a tree. on leaves decay : On Level Change Patterns: [on] [player] level (change|up|down) Since: 1.0, 2.4 (level up/down) Called when a player's level changes, e.g. by gathering experience or by enchanting something. on level change : On Lightning Strike Patterns: [on] lightning [strike] Since: 1.0 Called when lightning strikes. on lightning : spawn a zombie at location of event-entity On Move Patterns: [on] % entity type % (move|walk|step) Since: 2.6 Called when a player or entity moves. NOTE: Move event will only be called when the entity/player moves position, not orientation (ie: looking around). NOTE: These events can be performance heavy as they are called quite often. If you use these events, and later remove them, a server restart is recommended to clear registered events from Skript. on player move : if player does not have permission "player.can.move" : cancel event on skeleton move : if event-entity is not in world "world" : kill event-entity On Move On Patterns: [on] (step|walk)[ing] (on|over) % item types % * Since: 2.0 Called when a player moves onto a certain type of block. Please note that using this event can cause lag if there are many players online. on walking on dirt or grass : on stepping on stone : On Physics Patterns: [on] [block] physics Since: 1.4.6 Called when a physics check is done on a block. By cancelling this event you can prevent some things from happening, e.g. sand falling, dirt turning into grass, torches dropping if their supporting block is destroyed, etc.Please note that using this event might cause quite some lag since it gets called extremely often. # prevents sand from falling on block physics : block is sand cancel event On Pick Up Patterns: [on] [(player|entity)] (pick[ ]up|picking up) [[of] % item types % ] Since: unknown (before 2.1), 2.5 (entity) Called when a player/entity picks up an item. Please note that the item is still on the ground when this event is called. on pick up : on entity pickup of wheat : On Pig Zap Patterns: [on] pig[ ]zap Since: 1.0 Called when a pig is stroke by lightning and transformed into a zombie pigman. Cancel the event to prevent the transformation. on pig zap : On Piston Extend Patterns: [on] piston extend[ing] Since: 1.0 Called when a piston is about to extend. on piston extend : broadcast "A piston is extending!" On Piston Retract Patterns: [on] piston retract[ing] Since: 1.0 Called when a piston is about to retract. on piston retract : broadcast "A piston is retracting!" On Place Patterns: [on] [block] (plac(e|ing)|build[ing]) [[of] % item types / block datas % ] Since: 1.0, 2.6 (BlockData support) Called when a player places a block. on place : on place of a furnace, workbench or chest : on break of chest[type=right] or chest[type=left] On Player World Change Patterns: [on] [player] world chang (ing|e[d]) Since: 2.2-dev28 Called when a player enters a world. Does not work with other entities! on player world change : world is "city" send "Welcome to the City!" On Portal Patterns: [on] [player] portal Since: 1.0 Called when a player uses a nether or end portal. Cancel the event to prevent the player from teleporting. on player portal : On Portal Create Patterns: [on] portal creat (e|ion) Since: 1.0, 2.5.3 (event-entity support) Called when a portal is created, either by a player or mob lighting an obsidian frame on fire, or by a nether portal creating its teleportation target in the nether/overworld. In Minecraft 1.14+, you can use the player in this event. Please note that there may not always be a player (or other entity) in this event. on portal create : On Portal Enter Patterns: [on] portal enter[ing][on] entering [a] portal Since: 1.0 Called when an entity enters a nether portal or an end portal. Please note that this event will be fired many times for a nether portal. on portal enter : On Prepare Craft Patterns: [on] [player] (preparing|beginning) craft [ing] [[of] % item types % ] Since: 2.2-Fixes-V10 Called just before displaying crafting result to player. Note that setting the result item might or might not work due to Bukkit bugs. on preparing craft of torch : On Pressure Plate / Trip Patterns: [on] [step[ping] on] [a] [pressure] plate[ on ] (trip|[ step [ping] on ] [a] tripwire) Since: 1.0 (pressure plate), 1.4.4 (tripwire) Called when a player steps on a pressure plate or tripwire respectively. on step on pressure plate : On Projectile Collide Patterns: [on] projectile collide Since: 2.5 Called when a projectile collides with an entity. on projectile collide : teleport shooter of event-projectile to event-entity On Projectile Hit Patterns: [on] projectile hit Since: 1.0 Called when a projectile hits an entity or a block. Use the damage event with a check for a projectile to be able to use the entity that got hit in the case when the projectile hit a living entity. A damage event will even be fired if the damage is 0, e.g. when throwing snowballs at non-nether mobs. on projectile hit : event-projectile is arrow delete event-projectile On Quit Patterns: [on] (quit[ting]|disconnect[ing]|log[ ] out |logging out |leav(e|ing)) Since: 1.0 (simple disconnection) Called when a player leaves the server. on quit : on disconnect : On Redstone Patterns: [on] redstone [current] [chang(e|ing)] Since: 1.0 Called when the redstone current of a block changes. This event is of not much use yet. on redstone change : send "someone is using redstone" to console On Region Enter / Leave Patterns: [on] (enter[ing]|leav(e|ing)|exit[ing]) [of] ([a] region|[[the] region] % regions %)[on] region (enter[ing]|leav(e|ing)|exit[ing]) Since: 2.1 Called when a player enters or leaves a region . This event requires a supported regions plugin to be installed. on region exit : message "Leaving %region%." On Resource Pack Request Response Patterns: [on] resource pack [request] response[on] resource pack [request] % resource pack states % Since: 2.4 Called when a player takes action on a resource pack request sent via the send resource pack effect. The resource pack condition can be used to check the resource pack state. This event will be triggered once when the player accepts or declines the resource pack request, and once when the resource pack is successfully installed or failed to download. on resource pack request response : if the resource pack was declined or failed to download : on resource pack deny : kick the player due to "You have to install the resource pack to play in this server!" On Respawn Patterns: [on] [player] respawn[ing] Since: 1.0 Called when a player respawns. You should prefer this event over the death event as the player is technically alive when this event is called. on respawn : On Resurrct Attempt Patterns: [on] [entity] resurrect[ion] [attempt] Since: 2.2-dev28 Called when an entity dies, always. If they are not holding a totem, this is cancelled - you can, however, uncancel it. on resurrect attempt : entity is player entity has permission "admin.undying" uncancel the event On Riptide Patterns: [on] [use of] riptide [enchant[ment]] Since: 2.5 Called when the player activates the riptide enchantment, using their trident to propel them through the air. Note: the riptide action is performed client side, so manipulating the player in this event may have undesired effects. on riptide : send "You are riptiding!" On Script Load / Unload Patterns: [on] [(async)] [script] (load|init|enable)[on] [(async)] [script] (unload|stop|disable) Since: 2.0 Called directly after the trigger is loaded, or directly before the whole script is unloaded. The keyword 'async' indicates the trigger can be ran asynchronously, on load : set {running::%script%} to true on unload : set {running::%script%} to false On Server List Ping Patterns: [on] server [list] ping Since: 2.3 Called when a server list ping is coming in, generally when a Minecraft client pings the server to show its information in the server list. The IP expression can be used to get the IP adress of the pinger. This event can be cancelled on PaperSpigot 1.12.2+ only and this means the player will see the server as offline (but still can join). Also you can use MOTD , Max Players , Online Players Count , Protocol Version , Version String , Hover List and Server Icon expressions, and Player Info Visibility and Hide Player from Server List effects to modify the server list. on server list ping : set the motd to "Welcome %{player-by-IP::%ip%}%! Join now!" if {player-by-IP::%ip%} is set, else "Join now!" set the fake max players count to (online players count + 1) set the shown icon to a random server icon out of {server-icons::*} On Server Start / Stop Patterns: [on] (server|skript) (start|load|enable)[on] (server|skript) (stop|unload|disable) Since: 2.0 Called when the server starts or stops (actually, when Skript starts or stops, so a /reload will trigger these events as well). on skript start : on server stop : On Sheep Regrow Wool Patterns: [on] sheep [re]grow[ing] wool Since: 2.2-dev21 Called when sheep regrows its sheared wool back. on sheep grow wool : cancel event On Shoot Patterns: [on] [projectile] shoot Since: 1.0 Called whenever a projectile is shot. Use the shooter expression to get who shot the projectile. on shoot : if projectile is an arrow : send "you shot an arrow!" to shooter On Sign Change Patterns: [on] sign (chang[e]|edit)[ing][on] [player] (chang[e]|edit)[ing] [a] sign Since: 1.0 As signs are placed empty, this event is called when a player is done editing a sign. on sign change : line 2 is empty set line 1 to "<red>%line 1%" On Slime Split Patterns: [on] slime split[ting] Since: 2.2-dev26 Called when a slime splits. Usually this happens when a big slime dies. on slime split : On Smelt Patterns: [on] [ore] smelt[ing][on] smelt[ing] of ore Since: 1.0 Called when a furnace smelts an item in its ore slot . on smelt : On Sneak Toggle Patterns: [on] [player] toggl (e|ing) sneak [on] [player] sneak toggl (e|ing) Since: 1.0 Called when a player starts or stops sneaking. Use is sneaking to get whether the player was sneaking before the event was called. # make players that stop sneaking jump on sneak toggle : player is sneaking push the player upwards at speed 0.5 On Spawn Patterns: [on] spawn[ing] [of % entity types %] Since: 1.0, 2.5.1 (non-living entities) Called when an entity spawns (excluding players). on spawn of a zombie : on spawn of an ender dragon : broadcast "A dragon has been sighted in %world%!" On Spawn Change Patterns: [on] [world] spawn change Since: 1.0 Called when the spawn point of a world changes. on spawn change : broadcast "someone changed the spawn!" On Sponge Absorb Patterns: [on] sponge absorb Since: 2.5 Called when a sponge absorbs blocks. on sponge absorb : loop absorbed blocks : broadcast "%loop-block% was absorbed by a sponge"! On Spread Patterns: [on] spread[ing] Since: 1.0 Called when a new block forms as a result of a block that can spread, e.g. water or mushrooms. on spread : On Sprint Toggle Patterns: [on] [player] toggl (e|ing) sprint [on] [player] sprint toggl (e|ing) Since: 1.0 Called when a player starts or stops sprinting. Use is sprinting to get whether the player was sprinting before the event was called. on sprint toggle : player is not sprinting send "Run!" On Swim Toggle Patterns: [on] [entity] toggl (e|ing) swim [on] [entity] swim toggl (e|ing) Since: 2.3 Called when an entity swims or stops swimming. on swim toggle : event-entity does not have permission "swim" cancel event On Tame Patterns: [on] [entity] tam (e|ing) Since: 1.0 Called when a player tames a wolf or ocelot. Can be cancelled to prevent the entity from being tamed. on tame : On Target Patterns: [on] [entity] target[on] [entity] un[-]target Since: 1.0 Called when a mob starts/stops following/attacking another entity, usually a player. on entity target : target is a player On Teleport Patterns: [on] [player] teleport[ing] Since: 1.0 Called whenever a player is teleported, either by a nether/end portal or other means (e.g. by plugins). on teleport : On Throwing of an Egg Patterns: [on] throw[ing] [of] [an] egg [on] [player] egg throw Since: 1.0 Called when a player throws an egg. You can just use the shoot event in most cases, as this event is intended to support changing the hatched mob and its chance to hatch, but Skript does not yet support that. on throw of an egg : On Tool Change Patterns: [ on ] [player['s]] (tool|item held|held item) chang(e|ing) Since: 1.0 Called whenever a player changes their held item by selecting a different slot (e.g. the keys 1-9 or the mouse wheel), not by dropping or replacing the item in the current slot. on player's held item change : On Vehicle Create Patterns: [on] vehicle create[on] creat (e|ing|ion of) [a] vehicle Since: 1.0 Called when a new vehicle is created, e.g. when a player places a boat or minecart. on vehicle create : On Vehicle Damage Patterns: [on] vehicle damage[on] damag (e|ing) [a] vehicle Since: 1.0 Called when a vehicle gets damage. Too much damage will destroy the vehicle. on vehicle damage : On Vehicle Destroy Patterns: [on] vehicle destroy[on] destr (oy[ing]|uction of) [a] vehicle Since: 1.0 Called when a vehicle is destroyed. Any passenger will be ejected and the vehicle might drop some item(s). on vehicle destroy : cancel event On Vehicle Enter Patterns: [on] vehicle enter[on] enter[ing] [a] vehicle Since: 1.0 Called when an entity enters a vehicle, either deliberately (players) or by falling into them (mobs). on vehicle enter : entity is a player cancel event On Vehicle Exit Patterns: [ on ] vehicle exit [on] exit[ing] [a] vehicle Since: 1.0 Called when an entity exits a vehicle. on vehicle exit : if event-entity is a spider : kill event-entity On Weather Change Patterns: [on] weather change [to % weather types %] Since: 1.0 Called when a world's weather changes. on weather change : on weather change to sunny : On World Init Patterns: [on] world init [ialization] Since: 1.0 Called when a world is initialised. As all default worlds are initialised before any scripts are loaded, this event is only called for newly created worlds. World management plugins might change the behaviour of this event though. on world init : On World Load Patterns: [on] world load[ing] Since: 1.0 Called when a world is loaded. As with the world init event, this event will not be called for the server's default world(s). on world load : send "World is loading..." to console On World Save Patterns: [on] world sav (e|ing) Since: 1.0 Called when a world is saved to disk. Usually all worlds are saved simultaneously, but world management plugins could change this. on world saving : broadcast "World has been saved!" On World Unload Patterns: [on] world unload[ing] Since: 1.0 Called when a world is unloaded. This event might never be called if you don't have a world management plugin. on world unload : cancel event On Zombie Break Door Patterns: [on] zombie break[ing] [a] [wood[en]] door Since: 1.0 Called when a zombie is done breaking a wooden door. Can be cancelled to prevent the zombie from breaking the door. on zombie breaking a wood door : Periodical Patterns: every % time span % Since: 1.0 An event that is called periodically. every 2 seconds : every minecraft hour : every tick : # can cause lag depending on the code inside the event every minecraft days : Periodical Patterns: every % time span % in [world[s]] % worlds % Since: 1.0 An event that is called periodically. every 2 seconds in "world" : every minecraft hour in "flatworld" : every tick in "world" : # can cause lag depending on the code inside the event every minecraft days in "plots" :
docs.title: 事件

docs.text: 返回目录
docs.title: 事件

docs.text: Patterns: at % time % [in % worlds %] Since: 1.3.4 在特定时间( 游戏时间 )调用 at 18:00 at 7am in "world"
docs.title: 时间事件

docs.text: Patterns: [on] (area|AoE) [cloud] effect Since: 2.2-dev21 Called when area effect cloud applies its potion effect. This happens every 5 ticks by default. on area cloud effect :
docs.title: On AoE Cloud Effect

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [player] arm swing Since: 2.5.1 当玩家角色做出有关于手臂的相关动作时触发 on arm swing : send "You swung your arm!"
docs.title: 动作事件

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [player] armor change[d] Since: 2.5 当玩家更换盔甲时调用 on armor change : broadcast "You equipped %event-item%!" Missing 经测试无效果
docs.title: On Armor Change

docs.text: Patterns: [on] bed enter[ing] [on] [player] enter[ing] [a] bed Since: 1.0 当玩家使用床睡觉的时候触发 on bed enter : send "该触发条件：当玩家在夜晚时使用床睡觉时触发。白天使用床，并不会触发脚本。"
docs.title: On Bed Enter

docs.text: Patterns: [on] bed leav (e|ing) [on] [player] leav (e|ing) [a] bed Since: 1.0 起床的时候调用 on bed leave : send "当玩家起床时调用"
docs.title: On Bed Leave

docs.text: Patterns: [on] block damag(ing|e) Since: 1.0 当玩家破坏方块时调用。通常可以使用 leftclick 事件 on block damaging : # 判定破坏方块的类型是否为 log (原木) - 当然可以是其他方块 if block is log : send "你正在破坏原木方块"
docs.title: On Block Damage

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [block] fertilize Since: 2.5 施肥时调 on block fertilize : send "&b施肥时调用 : &r施肥范围 (&e%size of fertilized blocks%&r格方块受到影响)."
docs.title: On Block Fertilize

docs.text: Patterns: [on] (plant|crop|block) grow [(th|ing)] [[of] % item types % ] Since: 2.2-修复-V10 当作物生长时调用. on crop growing : broadcast "plant=植物|crop=作物|block=方块|grow拥有两种模式 -> growth 或 gorwing"
docs.title: On Block Growth

docs.text: Patterns: [on] book (edit|change|write) Since: 2.2-dev31 当编辑一本书的时候调用 on book edit : broadcast "编辑书并点击完成时调用，如果未改动书中内容并点击完成是不调用的"
docs.title: On Book Edit

docs.text: Patterns: [on] book sign[ing] Since: 2.2-dev31 当玩家署名一本书调用 on book sign : broadcast "已署名一本书调用(On Book Sign)"
docs.title: On Book Sign

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [block] (break[ing]|min(e|ing)) [[of] % item types / block datas % ] Since: 1.0 (break), unknown (mine), 2.6 (BlockData support) 当方块被玩家摧毁时调用。如果使用 'Mine' , 只有破坏方块掉落事件才会调用。 #---------------------------------------------# # 第一种形式：未指定方块类型 # 特性一：当挖掘等级不符合则不调用，挖掘等级高于自身的方块时也不掉落 # 特性二：破坏完成之后调用。有一个先后顺序 on mine : broadcast "[on mine] 被调用" #---------------------------------------------# # 第二种形式：指定方块类型 on mine of any ore : broadcast "[on mine of any ore] 被调用" #---------------------------------------------# # 破坏 指定物品时才掉落 这里案例用的是 stone on break of stone : broadcast "我破坏了 %item%" #---------------------------------------------# # 该定义了破坏箱子时,需要指定朝向 on break of chest[facing=north] : broadcast "箱子被破坏" #---------------------------------------------# # 该定义了破坏作物方块时，可指定作物的成熟度 on break of potatoes[age=7] : broadcast "作物被破坏"
docs.title: On Break/Mine

docs.text: Patterns: [on] bucket empty[ing] [on] [player] empty[ing] [a] bucket Since: 1.0 当清空水桶时调用. 可以使用 放置事件 来判定是水或者岩浆. on bucket empty : broadcast "&a案例：&7[&bOn Bucket Empty&7] &a成功调用！"
docs.title: On Bucket Empty

docs.text: Patterns: [on] bucket fill[ing] [on] [player] fill[ing] [a] bucket Since: 1.0 当玩家的桶中有液体时调用 on player filling a bucket : broadcast "&a案例：&7[&bOn Bucket fill&7] &a成功调用！"
docs.title: On Bucket fill

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [block] burn[ing] [[of] % item types / block datas %] Since: 1.0, 2.6 (BlockData support) 当方块被烧毁时调用 # 方块被点燃时并不会调用，而是方块被烧毁之后才调用！ # 注意顺序问题 on burn : broadcast "&a案例：&7[&bOn Burn&7] &a成功调用！" # 可以指定多个物品类型 wood = 木头 ， fences = 栅栏 ， chests = 箱子 # 测试无效 on burn of wood, fences, or chests : broadcast "&a案例：&7[&bOn Burn&7] &a成功调用！" on burn of oak_log[axis=y] :
docs.title: On Burn

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [block] can build check Since: 1.0 (basic), 2.0 ([un]cancellable) 当玩家持有方块或可放置物品时右键点击放置方块时调用. 可通过取消事件(cancel)来阻止放置方块,也可以取消. 注意: 要放置方块的 data 是无法使用的.只有 ID 是有效可用的. on block can build check : cancel event
docs.title: On Can Build Check

docs.text: Patterns: [on] chat Since: 1.4.1 每当玩家发送消息时调用. 使用 聊天格式化 修改消息格式t, 使用 聊天对象 编辑收/发消息的聊天对象. on chat : if player has permission "owner" : set chat format to "<red>[player]<light gray> : <light red>[message]" else if player has permission "admin" : set chat format to "<light red>[player]<light gray> : <orange>[message]" else : #default message format set chat format to "<orange>[player]<light gray> : <white>[message]"
docs.title: On Chat

docs.text: Patterns: [on] chunk (generat|populat)(e|ing) Since: 1.0 当生成新区块时调用. on chunk generate :
docs.title: On Chunk Generate

docs.text: Patterns: [on] chunk load[ing] Since: 1.0 当区块加载时调用。 on chunk load :
docs.title: On Chunk Load

docs.text: Patterns: [on] chunk unload[ing] Since: 1.0 当取消区块加载时调用。 on chunk unload :
docs.title: On Chunk Unload

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [(right|left)] [( |-)]] [mouse[( |-)]]click[ing] [on % entity type / item type %] [(with|using|holding) % item type %] [on] [(right|left) [( |-)]] [mouse[( |-)]]click[ing] (with|using|holding) % item type % on % entity type / item type % Since: 1.0 当玩家点击：方块、实体、空气时调用，无论玩家是否有手持物品。 注意：空手右键空气事件无法调用。 on click : on rightclick holding a fishing rod : on leftclick on a stone or obsidian : on rightclick on a creeper : on click with a sword :
docs.title: On Click

docs.text: Patterns: [on] combust[ing] Since: 1.0 当实体着火时调用。 例如：岩浆、火、火球、阳光(特指僵尸、骷髅) on combust :
docs.title: On Combust

docs.text: Patterns: [on] command [% text %] Since: 2.0 当玩家输入命令时调用。 命令可以是任意命令不一定要是Skript的命令。 查看关于Skript命令 . on command : on command "/stop" : on command "pm Njol " :
docs.title: On Command

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [player] connect[ing] Since: 2.0 当玩家连接服务器时调用。 与 on join 不同，该事件是指玩家在连接过程中时调用。 on join 是玩家加入了服务器后才会被调用的。 on connect : player doesn't have permission "VIP" number of players is greater than 15 kick the player due to "The last 5 slots are reserved for VIP players."
docs.title: On Connect

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [player] ((eat|drink)[ing]|consum(e|ing)) [[of] % item types % ] Since: 2.0 当玩家吃/喝/完时调用。 例如：牛奶、苹果、面包、药水、肉... on consume :
docs.title: On Consume

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [player] craft[ing] [[of] % item types %] Since: unknown (before 2.1) 当玩家合成(制作)物品时调用 on craft :
docs.title: On Craft

docs.text: Patterns: [on] creeper power Since: 1.0 当苦力怕被闪电击中后变成闪电苦力怕时调用。 当然可以被取消该事件 on creeper power :
docs.title: On Creeper Power

docs.text: Patterns: [on] damag (e|ing) [of % entity type %] Since: 1.0 当一个实体受到另一个实体的伤害时调用。 包含：岩浆、火焰、窒息、衰落、等 on damage : on damage of a player :
docs.title: On Damage

docs.text: Patterns: [on] death [of % entity types %] Since: 1.0 当生物（包含玩家）死亡时调用 on death : on death of player : on death of a wither or ender dragon : broadcast "A %entity% has been slain in %world%!"
docs.title: On Death

docs.text: Patterns: [on] dispens (e|ing) [[of] % item types % ] Since: unknown (before 2.1) 当发射器发射容器内物品时调用 on dispense of iron block : broadcast "&7[&bOn Dispense&7] &a被调用"
docs.title: On Dispense

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [player] drop[ing] [[of] % item types %] Since: unknown (before 2.1) 当玩家从他们的物品背包栏中丢弃物品时调用 on drop : broadcast "&7[&bOn Drop&7] &a被调用"
docs.title: On Drop

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [item] enchant Since: 2.5 当玩家成功附魔物品时调用. 查看附魔内容 on enchant : if the clicked button is enchantment option 1 : set the applied enchantments to sharpness 10 and unbreaking 10
docs.title: On Enchant

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [item] enchant prepare Since: 2.5 当玩家将物品放入附魔台时调用。 附魔内容参考 on enchant prepare : set enchant offer 1 to sharpness 1 set the cost of enchant offer 1 to 10 levels
docs.title: On Enchant Prepare

docs.text: Patterns: [on] enderman place [on] enderman pickup [on] sheep eat[on] silverfish enter [ on ] silverfish exit [on] falling block land[ing] Since: unknown , 2.5.2 (falling block) 当方块状态被改变时调用。 末影人搬运方块或放置方块时、羊吃草地时、蠹虫钻入或钻出方块时、方块坠落落地形成方块状态时（沙子、沙砾） on sheep eat : kill entity broadcast "A sheep stole some grass!" on falling block land : if event-entity is a falling dirt : cancel event
docs.title: On Enderman/Sheep/Silverfish/Falling Block

docs.text: Patterns: [on] dismount[ing] Since: 2.2-dev13b 当实体从马上下来时调用 on dismount : kill event-entity
docs.title: On Entity Dismount

docs.text: Patterns: [on] mount[ing] Since: 2.2-dev13b 当实体乘骑时调用 on mount : cancel event
docs.title: On Entity Mount

docs.text: Patterns: [on] entity portal Since: 2.5.3 当实体通过传送门时调用. 可以 取消事件 阻止实体传送。 on entity portal : broadcast "A %type of event-entity% has entered a portal!
docs.title: On Entity Portal

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [e]xp[erience] [orb] spawn[on] spawn of [a[n]] [e]xp[erience] [orb] Since: 2.0 当经验即将生成时调用.可以通过该事件取消经验生成. Please note that it's impossible to detect xp orbs spawned by plugins (including Skript) with Bukkit, thus make sure that you have no such plugins if you don't want any xp orbs to spawn. (Many plugins that only change the experience dropped by blocks or entities will be detected without problems though) on xp spawn : world is "minigame_world" cancel event
docs.title: On Experience Spawn

docs.text: Patterns: [on] explo (d(e|ing)|sion) Since: 1.0 当爆炸事件发生时调用(包含了TNT爆炸或苦力怕的爆炸). on explosion :
docs.title: On Explode

docs.text: Patterns: [on] explosion prime Since: 1.0 当TNT被点燃或苦力怕距离很近即将爆炸时调用。苦力怕则可以远离它而中止该事件被调用。 on explosion prime :
docs.title: On Explosion Prime

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [block] fad (e|ing) [[of] % item types / block datas % ] Since: 1.0, 2.6 (BlockData support) 当方块即将消失时调用（雪或冰） on fade of snow or ice : on fade of snow[layers=2]
docs.title: On Fade

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [a] firework explo (d(e|ing)|sion) [colo[u] red % colors % ] Since: 2.4 当发射烟花并爆炸时调用. on firework explode on firework exploding colored red, light green and black on firework explosion coloured light green : broadcast "A firework colored %colors% was exploded at %location%!"
docs.title: On Firework Explode

docs.text: Patterns: [on] first ( join |login) Since: 1.3.7 当玩家首次登录时调用。 on first join : broadcast "Welcome %player% to the server!"
docs.title: On First Join

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [player] fish[ing] Since: 1.0 当玩家钓鱼时调用，然而并没有什么大的用处。 on fish :
docs.title: On Fishing

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [player] flight toggl (e|ing)[on] [player] toggl (e|ing) flight Since: 2.2-dev36 当玩家开始或停止飞行时调用。 on flight toggle : if {game::%player%::playing} exists : cancel event
docs.title: On Flight Toggle

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [block] flow[ing][on] block mov(e|ing) Since: 1.0 当水或岩浆（龙蛋）流动（传送）到其他方块时调用。 on block flow : if event-block is water : broadcast "Build more dams! It's starting to get wet in here"
docs.title: On Flow

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [block] form [ing] [[of] % item types / block datas %] Since: 1.0, 2.6 (BlockData support) 当非玩家创建方块时调用 例如：下雪而被雪覆盖的情况以及水结成冰又或则方块的扩散。该事件并非传播事件(参见 传播事件 ). on form of snow : on form of a mushroom :
docs.title: On Form

docs.text: Patterns: [on] fuel burn[ing] Since: 1.0 当熔炉使用 燃料槽 中的物品时调用 on fuel burning :
docs.title: On Fuel Burn

docs.text: Patterns: [on] game[ ]mode change [to % gamemode %] Since: 1.0 当玩家修改其 游戏模式 时调用。 on gamemode change : on gamemode change to adventure :
docs.title: On Gamemode Change

docs.text: Patterns: [on] (gliding state change|toggl(e|ing) gliding) Since: 2.2-dev21 当实体开启或关闭鞘翅滑翔时调用,或服务器强行切换实体的滑翔状态时调用. on toggling gliding : cancel the event # bad idea, but you CAN do it!
docs.title: On Gliding State Change

docs.text: Patterns: [on] grow [of (% tree type %|% item type %)] Since: 1.0 (2.2-dev20 for plants) 当 [树|蘑菇|植物] 长到下一个阶段时调用. on grow : on grow of a tree : on grow of a huge jungle tree :
docs.title: On Grow

docs.text: Patterns: [on] swap[ping of] [(hand|held)] item[s] Since: 2.3 当玩家使用快捷键切换主副手槽内的物品时调用. 当然主副手的槽可以是空同样能调用. 该事件是在切换之前调用的, 这使你可以取消该事件的发生. on swap hand items : event-player's tool is a diamond sword cancel event
docs.title: On Hand Item Swap

docs.text: Patterns: [on] heal[ing] Since: 1.0 当实体被治愈时调用。 on heal :
docs.title: On Heal

docs.text: Patterns: [on] horse jump Since: 2.5.1 Called when a horse jumps. on horse jump : push event-entity upwards at speed 2
docs.title: On Horse Jump

docs.text: Patterns: [on] (food|hunger) (level|met(er|re)|bar) chang (e|ing) Since: 1.4.4 Called when the hunger bar of a player changes, i.e. either increases by eating or decreases over time. on food bar change :
docs.title: On Hunger Meter Change

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [block] ignit (e|ion) Since: 1.0 Called when a block starts burning, i.e. a fire block is placed next to it and this block is flammable. The burn event will be called when the block is about do be destroyed by the fire. on block ignite : if event-block is a ladder : cancel event
docs.title: On Ignition

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [player] inventory (-| ) click [ing] [[at] % item types % ] Since: 2.2-Fixes-V10 Called when clicking on inventory slot. on inventory click : if event-item is stone : give player 1 stone remove 20$ from player's balance
docs.title: On Inventory Click

docs.text: Patterns: [on] inventory clos (ing|e[d]) Since: 2.2-dev21 Called when player's currently viewed inventory is closed. on inventory close : if player's location is {location} : send "You exited the shop!"
docs.title: On Inventory Close

docs.text: Patterns: [on] inventory open[ed] Since: 2.2-dev21 Called when an inventory is opened for player. on inventory open : close player's inventory
docs.title: On Inventory Open

docs.text: Patterns: [on] inventory pick[ ]up Since: 2.5.1 Called when an inventory (a hopper, a hopper minecart, etc.) picks up an item on inventory pickup :
docs.title: On Inventory Pickup

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [player] tool break[ing][on] [player] break[ing] [(a|the)] tool Since: 2.1.1 Called when a player breaks their tool because its damage reached the maximum value. This event cannot be cancelled. on tool break :
docs.title: On Item Break

docs.text: Patterns: [on] item damag (e|ing) Since: 2.5 Called when an item is damaged. Most tools are damaged by using them; armor is damaged when the wearer takes damage. on item damage : cancel event
docs.title: On Item Damage

docs.text: Patterns: [on] (item[ ][stack]|[item] % item types %) despawn [ing][on] [item[ ][stack]] despawn[ing] [[of] % item types %] Since: 2.2-dev35 Called when an item is about to be despawned from the world, usually 5 minutes after it was dropped. on item despawn of diamond : send "Not my precious!" cancel event
docs.title: On Item Despawn

docs.text: Patterns: [on] item mend[ing] Since: 2.5.1 Called when a player has an item repaired via the Mending enchantment. on item mend : chance of 50% : cancel the event send "Oops! Mending failed!" to player
docs.title: On Item Mend

docs.text: Patterns: [on] (item[ ][stack]|[item] % item types %) merg (e|ing)[on] item [ ][stack] merg (e|ing) [[of] % item types % ] Since: 2.2-dev35 Called when dropped items merge into a single stack. event-entity will be the entity which is trying to merge, and future event-entity will be the entity which is being merged into. on item merge of gold blocks : cancel event
docs.title: On Item Merge

docs.text: Patterns: [on] item spawn[ing] [[of] % item types %] Since: unknown (before 2.1) Called whenever an item stack is spawned in a world, e.g. as drop of a block or mob, a player throwing items out of their inventory, or a dispenser dispensing an item (not shooting it). on item spawn of iron sword : broadcast "Someone dropped an iron sword!"
docs.title: On Item Spawn

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [player] (login|logging in|join[ing]) Since: 1.0 Called when the player joins the server. The player is already in a world when this event is called, so if you want to prevent players from joining you should prefer on connect over this event. on join : message "Welcome on our awesome server!" broadcast "%player% just joined the server!"
docs.title: On Join

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [player] jump[ing] Since: 2.3 Called whenever a player jumps. This event requires PaperSpigot. on jump : event-player does not have permission "jump" cancel event
docs.title: On Jump

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [player] (kick|being kicked) Since: 1.0 Called when a player is kicked from the server. You can change the kick message or cancel the event entirely. on kick :
docs.title: On Kick

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [player] (language|locale) chang (e|ing)[on] [player] chang (e|ing) (language|locale) Since: 2.3 Called after a player changed their language in the game settings. You can use the language expression to get the current language of the player. This event requires Minecraft 1.12+. on language change : if player's language starts with "en" : send "Hello!"
docs.title: On Language Change

docs.text: Patterns: [on] leaves decay[ing] Since: 1.0 Called when a leaf block decays due to not being connected to a tree. on leaves decay :
docs.title: On Leaves Decay

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [player] level (change|up|down) Since: 1.0, 2.4 (level up/down) Called when a player's level changes, e.g. by gathering experience or by enchanting something. on level change :
docs.title: On Level Change

docs.text: Patterns: [on] lightning [strike] Since: 1.0 Called when lightning strikes. on lightning : spawn a zombie at location of event-entity
docs.title: On Lightning Strike

docs.text: Patterns: [on] % entity type % (move|walk|step) Since: 2.6 Called when a player or entity moves. NOTE: Move event will only be called when the entity/player moves position, not orientation (ie: looking around). NOTE: These events can be performance heavy as they are called quite often. If you use these events, and later remove them, a server restart is recommended to clear registered events from Skript. on player move : if player does not have permission "player.can.move" : cancel event on skeleton move : if event-entity is not in world "world" : kill event-entity
docs.title: On Move

docs.text: Patterns: [on] (step|walk)[ing] (on|over) % item types % * Since: 2.0 Called when a player moves onto a certain type of block. Please note that using this event can cause lag if there are many players online. on walking on dirt or grass : on stepping on stone :
docs.title: On Move On

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [block] physics Since: 1.4.6 Called when a physics check is done on a block. By cancelling this event you can prevent some things from happening, e.g. sand falling, dirt turning into grass, torches dropping if their supporting block is destroyed, etc.Please note that using this event might cause quite some lag since it gets called extremely often. # prevents sand from falling on block physics : block is sand cancel event
docs.title: On Physics

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [(player|entity)] (pick[ ]up|picking up) [[of] % item types % ] Since: unknown (before 2.1), 2.5 (entity) Called when a player/entity picks up an item. Please note that the item is still on the ground when this event is called. on pick up : on entity pickup of wheat :
docs.title: On Pick Up

docs.text: Patterns: [on] pig[ ]zap Since: 1.0 Called when a pig is stroke by lightning and transformed into a zombie pigman. Cancel the event to prevent the transformation. on pig zap :
docs.title: On Pig Zap

docs.text: Patterns: [on] piston extend[ing] Since: 1.0 Called when a piston is about to extend. on piston extend : broadcast "A piston is extending!"
docs.title: On Piston Extend

docs.text: Patterns: [on] piston retract[ing] Since: 1.0 Called when a piston is about to retract. on piston retract : broadcast "A piston is retracting!"
docs.title: On Piston Retract

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [block] (plac(e|ing)|build[ing]) [[of] % item types / block datas % ] Since: 1.0, 2.6 (BlockData support) Called when a player places a block. on place : on place of a furnace, workbench or chest : on break of chest[type=right] or chest[type=left]
docs.title: On Place

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [player] world chang (ing|e[d]) Since: 2.2-dev28 Called when a player enters a world. Does not work with other entities! on player world change : world is "city" send "Welcome to the City!"
docs.title: On Player World Change

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [player] portal Since: 1.0 Called when a player uses a nether or end portal. Cancel the event to prevent the player from teleporting. on player portal :
docs.title: On Portal

docs.text: Patterns: [on] portal creat (e|ion) Since: 1.0, 2.5.3 (event-entity support) Called when a portal is created, either by a player or mob lighting an obsidian frame on fire, or by a nether portal creating its teleportation target in the nether/overworld. In Minecraft 1.14+, you can use the player in this event. Please note that there may not always be a player (or other entity) in this event. on portal create :
docs.title: On Portal Create

docs.text: Patterns: [on] portal enter[ing][on] entering [a] portal Since: 1.0 Called when an entity enters a nether portal or an end portal. Please note that this event will be fired many times for a nether portal. on portal enter :
docs.title: On Portal Enter

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [player] (preparing|beginning) craft [ing] [[of] % item types % ] Since: 2.2-Fixes-V10 Called just before displaying crafting result to player. Note that setting the result item might or might not work due to Bukkit bugs. on preparing craft of torch :
docs.title: On Prepare Craft

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [step[ping] on] [a] [pressure] plate[ on ] (trip|[ step [ping] on ] [a] tripwire) Since: 1.0 (pressure plate), 1.4.4 (tripwire) Called when a player steps on a pressure plate or tripwire respectively. on step on pressure plate :
docs.title: On Pressure Plate / Trip

docs.text: Patterns: [on] projectile collide Since: 2.5 Called when a projectile collides with an entity. on projectile collide : teleport shooter of event-projectile to event-entity
docs.title: On Projectile Collide

docs.text: Patterns: [on] projectile hit Since: 1.0 Called when a projectile hits an entity or a block. Use the damage event with a check for a projectile to be able to use the entity that got hit in the case when the projectile hit a living entity. A damage event will even be fired if the damage is 0, e.g. when throwing snowballs at non-nether mobs. on projectile hit : event-projectile is arrow delete event-projectile
docs.title: On Projectile Hit

docs.text: Patterns: [on] (quit[ting]|disconnect[ing]|log[ ] out |logging out |leav(e|ing)) Since: 1.0 (simple disconnection) Called when a player leaves the server. on quit : on disconnect :
docs.title: On Quit

docs.text: Patterns: [on] redstone [current] [chang(e|ing)] Since: 1.0 Called when the redstone current of a block changes. This event is of not much use yet. on redstone change : send "someone is using redstone" to console
docs.title: On Redstone

docs.text: Patterns: [on] (enter[ing]|leav(e|ing)|exit[ing]) [of] ([a] region|[[the] region] % regions %)[on] region (enter[ing]|leav(e|ing)|exit[ing]) Since: 2.1 Called when a player enters or leaves a region . This event requires a supported regions plugin to be installed. on region exit : message "Leaving %region%."
docs.title: On Region Enter / Leave

docs.text: Patterns: [on] resource pack [request] response[on] resource pack [request] % resource pack states % Since: 2.4 Called when a player takes action on a resource pack request sent via the send resource pack effect. The resource pack condition can be used to check the resource pack state. This event will be triggered once when the player accepts or declines the resource pack request, and once when the resource pack is successfully installed or failed to download. on resource pack request response : if the resource pack was declined or failed to download : on resource pack deny : kick the player due to "You have to install the resource pack to play in this server!"
docs.title: On Resource Pack Request Response

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [player] respawn[ing] Since: 1.0 Called when a player respawns. You should prefer this event over the death event as the player is technically alive when this event is called. on respawn :
docs.title: On Respawn

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [entity] resurrect[ion] [attempt] Since: 2.2-dev28 Called when an entity dies, always. If they are not holding a totem, this is cancelled - you can, however, uncancel it. on resurrect attempt : entity is player entity has permission "admin.undying" uncancel the event
docs.title: On Resurrct Attempt

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [use of] riptide [enchant[ment]] Since: 2.5 Called when the player activates the riptide enchantment, using their trident to propel them through the air. Note: the riptide action is performed client side, so manipulating the player in this event may have undesired effects. on riptide : send "You are riptiding!"
docs.title: On Riptide

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [(async)] [script] (load|init|enable)[on] [(async)] [script] (unload|stop|disable) Since: 2.0 Called directly after the trigger is loaded, or directly before the whole script is unloaded. The keyword 'async' indicates the trigger can be ran asynchronously, on load : set {running::%script%} to true on unload : set {running::%script%} to false
docs.title: On Script Load / Unload

docs.text: Patterns: [on] server [list] ping Since: 2.3 Called when a server list ping is coming in, generally when a Minecraft client pings the server to show its information in the server list. The IP expression can be used to get the IP adress of the pinger. This event can be cancelled on PaperSpigot 1.12.2+ only and this means the player will see the server as offline (but still can join). Also you can use MOTD , Max Players , Online Players Count , Protocol Version , Version String , Hover List and Server Icon expressions, and Player Info Visibility and Hide Player from Server List effects to modify the server list. on server list ping : set the motd to "Welcome %{player-by-IP::%ip%}%! Join now!" if {player-by-IP::%ip%} is set, else "Join now!" set the fake max players count to (online players count + 1) set the shown icon to a random server icon out of {server-icons::*}
docs.title: On Server List Ping

docs.text: Patterns: [on] (server|skript) (start|load|enable)[on] (server|skript) (stop|unload|disable) Since: 2.0 Called when the server starts or stops (actually, when Skript starts or stops, so a /reload will trigger these events as well). on skript start : on server stop :
docs.title: On Server Start / Stop

docs.text: Patterns: [on] sheep [re]grow[ing] wool Since: 2.2-dev21 Called when sheep regrows its sheared wool back. on sheep grow wool : cancel event
docs.title: On Sheep Regrow Wool

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [projectile] shoot Since: 1.0 Called whenever a projectile is shot. Use the shooter expression to get who shot the projectile. on shoot : if projectile is an arrow : send "you shot an arrow!" to shooter
docs.title: On Shoot

docs.text: Patterns: [on] sign (chang[e]|edit)[ing][on] [player] (chang[e]|edit)[ing] [a] sign Since: 1.0 As signs are placed empty, this event is called when a player is done editing a sign. on sign change : line 2 is empty set line 1 to "<red>%line 1%"
docs.title: On Sign Change

docs.text: Patterns: [on] slime split[ting] Since: 2.2-dev26 Called when a slime splits. Usually this happens when a big slime dies. on slime split :
docs.title: On Slime Split

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [ore] smelt[ing][on] smelt[ing] of ore Since: 1.0 Called when a furnace smelts an item in its ore slot . on smelt :
docs.title: On Smelt

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [player] toggl (e|ing) sneak [on] [player] sneak toggl (e|ing) Since: 1.0 Called when a player starts or stops sneaking. Use is sneaking to get whether the player was sneaking before the event was called. # make players that stop sneaking jump on sneak toggle : player is sneaking push the player upwards at speed 0.5
docs.title: On Sneak Toggle

docs.text: Patterns: [on] spawn[ing] [of % entity types %] Since: 1.0, 2.5.1 (non-living entities) Called when an entity spawns (excluding players). on spawn of a zombie : on spawn of an ender dragon : broadcast "A dragon has been sighted in %world%!"
docs.title: On Spawn

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [world] spawn change Since: 1.0 Called when the spawn point of a world changes. on spawn change : broadcast "someone changed the spawn!"
docs.title: On Spawn Change

docs.text: Patterns: [on] sponge absorb Since: 2.5 Called when a sponge absorbs blocks. on sponge absorb : loop absorbed blocks : broadcast "%loop-block% was absorbed by a sponge"!
docs.title: On Sponge Absorb

docs.text: Patterns: [on] spread[ing] Since: 1.0 Called when a new block forms as a result of a block that can spread, e.g. water or mushrooms. on spread :
docs.title: On Spread

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [player] toggl (e|ing) sprint [on] [player] sprint toggl (e|ing) Since: 1.0 Called when a player starts or stops sprinting. Use is sprinting to get whether the player was sprinting before the event was called. on sprint toggle : player is not sprinting send "Run!"
docs.title: On Sprint Toggle

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [entity] toggl (e|ing) swim [on] [entity] swim toggl (e|ing) Since: 2.3 Called when an entity swims or stops swimming. on swim toggle : event-entity does not have permission "swim" cancel event
docs.title: On Swim Toggle

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [entity] tam (e|ing) Since: 1.0 Called when a player tames a wolf or ocelot. Can be cancelled to prevent the entity from being tamed. on tame :
docs.title: On Tame

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [entity] target[on] [entity] un[-]target Since: 1.0 Called when a mob starts/stops following/attacking another entity, usually a player. on entity target : target is a player
docs.title: On Target

docs.text: Patterns: [on] [player] teleport[ing] Since: 1.0 Called whenever a player is teleported, either by a nether/end portal or other means (e.g. by plugins). on teleport :
docs.title: On Teleport

docs.text: Patterns: [on] throw[ing] [of] [an] egg [on] [player] egg throw Since: 1.0 Called when a player throws an egg. You can just use the shoot event in most cases, as this event is intended to support changing the hatched mob and its chance to hatch, but Skript does not yet support that. on throw of an egg :
docs.title: On Throwing of an Egg

docs.text: Patterns: [ on ] [player['s]] (tool|item held|held item) chang(e|ing) Since: 1.0 Called whenever a player changes their held item by selecting a different slot (e.g. the keys 1-9 or the mouse wheel), not by dropping or replacing the item in the current slot. on player's held item change :
docs.title: On Tool Change

docs.text: Patterns: [on] vehicle create[on] creat (e|ing|ion of) [a] vehicle Since: 1.0 Called when a new vehicle is created, e.g. when a player places a boat or minecart. on vehicle create :
docs.title: On Vehicle Create

docs.text: Patterns: [on] vehicle damage[on] damag (e|ing) [a] vehicle Since: 1.0 Called when a vehicle gets damage. Too much damage will destroy the vehicle. on vehicle damage :
docs.title: On Vehicle Damage

docs.text: Patterns: [on] vehicle destroy[on] destr (oy[ing]|uction of) [a] vehicle Since: 1.0 Called when a vehicle is destroyed. Any passenger will be ejected and the vehicle might drop some item(s). on vehicle destroy : cancel event
docs.title: On Vehicle Destroy

docs.text: Patterns: [on] vehicle enter[on] enter[ing] [a] vehicle Since: 1.0 Called when an entity enters a vehicle, either deliberately (players) or by falling into them (mobs). on vehicle enter : entity is a player cancel event
docs.title: On Vehicle Enter

docs.text: Patterns: [ on ] vehicle exit [on] exit[ing] [a] vehicle Since: 1.0 Called when an entity exits a vehicle. on vehicle exit : if event-entity is a spider : kill event-entity
docs.title: On Vehicle Exit

docs.text: Patterns: [on] weather change [to % weather types %] Since: 1.0 Called when a world's weather changes. on weather change : on weather change to sunny :
docs.title: On Weather Change

docs.text: Patterns: [on] world init [ialization] Since: 1.0 Called when a world is initialised. As all default worlds are initialised before any scripts are loaded, this event is only called for newly created worlds. World management plugins might change the behaviour of this event though. on world init :
docs.title: On World Init

docs.text: Patterns: [on] world load[ing] Since: 1.0 Called when a world is loaded. As with the world init event, this event will not be called for the server's default world(s). on world load : send "World is loading..." to console
docs.title: On World Load

docs.text: Patterns: [on] world sav (e|ing) Since: 1.0 Called when a world is saved to disk. Usually all worlds are saved simultaneously, but world management plugins could change this. on world saving : broadcast "World has been saved!"
docs.title: On World Save

docs.text: Patterns: [on] world unload[ing] Since: 1.0 Called when a world is unloaded. This event might never be called if you don't have a world management plugin. on world unload : cancel event
docs.title: On World Unload

docs.text: Patterns: [on] zombie break[ing] [a] [wood[en]] door Since: 1.0 Called when a zombie is done breaking a wooden door. Can be cancelled to prevent the zombie from breaking the door. on zombie breaking a wood door :
docs.title: On Zombie Break Door

docs.text: Patterns: every % time span % Since: 1.0 An event that is called periodically. every 2 seconds : every minecraft hour : every tick : # can cause lag depending on the code inside the event every minecraft days :
docs.title: Periodical

docs.text: Patterns: every % time span % in [world[s]] % worlds % Since: 1.0 An event that is called periodically. every 2 seconds in "world" : every minecraft hour in "flatworld" : every tick in "world" : # can cause lag depending on the code inside the event every minecraft days in "plots" :
docs.title: Periodical
